overview: You have never taken a flight like this before! Magnificent magazine model Chloe Jones joins the mile high club in this aerial sex adventure where pilots, passengers and flight attendants can't wait to get down and get it on! Chloe is the lead flight attendant and tends to set the sexual action as she teaches the young crew just how friendly her skies can be!
tagline: Flying Will Never Be The Same
title: Air Erotica
